summary:
The Federated States of Micronesia (FSM) is a small island country in the Pacific Ocean, part of a region called Micronesia. It consists of four main states: Yap, Chuuk, Pohnpei, and Kosrae, with many smaller islands. These islands are spread out over a large area, north of the equator. The country's capital is Palikir, and its largest city is Weno.

Micronesia was once under U.S. administration but became a sovereign state in 1986. It is now a member of the United Nations and has its own government. The country is known for its beautiful islands and rich culture.
title: Federated States of Micronesia
